arts.ttl: Sunderland v Everton: Premier League – live
arts.sum: Updates from 8pm GMT kick-off at Stadium of Light Get in touch! Share your thoughts with Rob Sunderland are unchanged from their dramatic victory at Chelsea. Thierno Barry replaces Beto in attack for Everton. Sunderland (3-4-2-1) Roefs; Mukiele, Ballard, Geertruida; Hume, Xhaka, Sadiki, Reinildo; Traore, Le Fee; Isidor. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Sunderland vs Everton – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Premier League surprise package Sunderland host Everton in a compelling Monday night fixture at the Stadium of Light. The two clubs enter the match at opposite ends of the form table. The newly-promoted Black Cats sit sixth after a stunning comeback win at Chelsea. arts.ttl: Sunderland vs Everton – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Sunderland welcome Everton on Monday night, aiming for a third consecutive Premier League victory. This is a feat the Black Cats have not achieved since May 2014. Régis Le Bris’s side are currently flying high in sixth place. Their successful campaign has been built on remarkable resilience. arts.ttl: Sunderland vs Everton prediction: Black Cats primed for another win
arts.sum: Sunderland have been the surprise package of the Premier League season and their ability to keep a misfiring Everton side quiet can lead them to a fourth home win in five attempts, says Enda McElhinney.
